name: Blackjack (itch) (QiuyuChen)
description: You wake up on the street next to a Casino. You don't remember who you are and why you are here, but there is a suitcase beside you. When you open the suitcase you find 2 million cash and a note--"Play Blackjack with a man wearing a Gucci basketball hat in the Casino." As you step into the Casino and play the game, you slowly retrieve your memory and discover a big secret.
